articles.title: Royal AM to go ahead with play-off against Chippa United despite letter to PSL - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Royal AM will play their GladAfrica play-off match against Chippa United at the Chatsworth Stadium in Durban on Tuesday despite vowing in a letter to the PSL that they would not honour the fixture.
